name: Aviation Training School Algeria
about: Aviation Training School Algeria (ATS) is a premier institution providing customized aviation training solutions in accordance with both national and international standards. Our school is committed to delivering high-quality training programs for aspiring pilots, ensuring they are well-prepared for various aviation careers. With a fleet of advanced aircraft and experienced instructors, ATS offers a comprehensive learning environment that is both supportive and challenging. Our friendly and attentive staff are dedicated to helping students achieve their aviation goals. At ATS, we pride ourselves on our excellent training standards, making us one of the best aviation schools in Algeria. Join us for a constructive and rewarding aviation training experience.
services: ["Private Pilot License (PPL)\nAir Transport Pilot Licence ( ATPL )"]
